title: Densetsu Kyojin Ideon: Hatsudou-hen (The Ideon: Be Invoked)
synopsis: Pushed out to the far reaches of the galaxy, the crew of the Solo Ship faces impossible odds of survival. With the Earth destroyed and the remnants of the Buff Clan pushing them to their limit, the Ideon shows as the last line of defense for the battered remains of humanity.
characters: ['Jordan, Bes', 'Yuuki, Cosmo', 'Ajiba, Karala', 'Imhof, Kasha', 'Formossa, Sheryl', 'Zaral, Gije', 'Ira, Joliver', 'Kitten, Kitty', 'Piper, Lou', 'Afta, Deck']
staff: [['Takizawa, Toshifumi', ['Co-Director']], ['Tomino, Yoshiyuki', ['Director', ' Original Creator']], ['Matsuzaki, Kenichi', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Tomita, Sukehiro', ['Script']]]
